snippet: Stock markets on both sides of the Atlantic were encouraged by corporate profits, a well-received sale of government debt in Spain and a recovery in Apple shares.
abstract: Stock markets on both sides of the Atlantic are boosted by corporate profits, a well-received sale of government debt in Spain and a recovery in Apple shares.
lead_paragraph: Stock markets on both sides of the Atlantic were encouraged by corporate profits, a well-received sale of government debt in Spain and a recovery in Apple shares.

headline.seo: Indexes Rise on Profits and Spain Debt Sale
headline.main: Stocks Climb on Profits and Spain’s Debt Sale
headline.print_headline: Upturn on Profits and Spain’s Debt Sale
